text: Guilty by Suspicion is a 1991 legal drama movie. It is about the 1950s in Hollywood, in particular, the blacklist in Hollywood. Annette Bening plays Ruth. Robert De Niro plays David. Martin Scorsese plays Joe Lesser. This movie was released on March 15, 1991. The reviews were good. Category:1991 drama movies Category:American drama movies
title: Guilty by Suspicion
